Key Responsibilities:

Campaign Concept & Strategy

  • Translate business objectives and marketing goals into compelling visual narratives.

job_description:
System Engineer L2/L3

Employment Type: Full-Time Experience: 2+ Years

About the Role:

We are looking for a skilled and reliable L2/L3 System Engineer to join our team to support and manage the rapidly evolving IT infrastructure terrain. This role involves managing mission-critical infrastructure, ensuring system uptime, and resolving complex technical issues across Linux/Windows servers, Cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure), and Enterprise applications. Your role will involve 24x7 support, along with proactive monitoring, automation, incident handling, and escalation management.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Provide L2/L3 support for Linux/Windows servers, networking, cloud infrastructure, and enterprise applications.
  • Manage and troubleshoot incidents, outages, and performance bottlenecks across production and staging environments.
  • Implement and maintain system monitoring, alerting, and backup strategies.
  • Perform OS patching, system upgrades, and capacity planning.
  • Automate repetitive tasks using Bash, Python, Ansible, or similar tools.
  • Collaborate with DevOps, SRE, and development teams to implement infrastructure-as-code (IaC) and CI/CD pipelines.
  • Support cloud environments (AWS, GCP, or Azure), including EC2, RDS, S3, IAM, VPC, etc.
  • Maintain system and security compliance as per industry standards.
  • Document processes, SOPs, RCA reports, and change logs effectively.

Required Skills & Experience:

  • Strong hands-on experience in Linux server administration (CentOS/Ubuntu/Debian, etc).
  • Basic hands-on experience with AWS or GCP cloud environments and familiarity with key services.
  • Exposure to virtualization and container technologies like Docker or Kubernetes, and a working knowledge of common monitoring tools.
  • Comfortable with shell scripting, with some experience or interest in learning Python, Ansible, or Terraform.
  • Experience working with web servers (such as Nginx or Apache), databases (like MySQL or PostgreSQL), and basic understanding of queues services.
  • Good foundational knowledge of networking concepts including DNS, VPN, and firewall rules.
  • Familiar with CI/CD tools (e.g: Jenkins, GitLab CI) and version control systems like Git.
  • Ability to support all level tasks, troubleshoot technical issues, and escalate when necessary.
  • Strong eagerness to learn, with good problem-solving skills and a collaborative mindset.
  • Certifications like AWS, RHCE, or similar are a plus.
  • Experience working in 24x7 managed service environments is a plus.

Contact: If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@urolime.com
summary: Seeking an L2/L3 System Engineer with 2+ years of experience. Responsibilities include managing Linux/Windows servers, cloud infrastructure, and resolving complex technical issues with 24x7 support.

job_description:
Solution Architect - DevOps

We are seeking an experienced Project Manager - DevOps to lead and deliver complex projects within our DevOps ecosystem. The ideal candidate will bring a deep understanding of CI/CD pipelines, Dockerization, Kubernetes, and cloud-native architectures. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth project execution while fostering a DevOps culture that promotes automation, scalability, and operational excellence.

Key Responsibilities:

DevOps Expertise: - Develop, build, and maintain continuous integration/deployment (CI/CD) pipelines. - Lead Dockerized and Kubernetes-based deployments with a focus on microservices architecture. - Implement and manage infrastructure as code (IaC) using tools like Terraform, Ansible, or CloudFormation. - Architect and maintain highly available and scalable solutions across cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP (including EKS/AKS/GKE).

System Administration and Monitoring: - Manage Linux-based environments and ensure seamless operation. - Set up and maintain logging, monitoring, and tracing systems using ELK Stack, Prometheus/Grafana, or cloud-native monitoring services. - Optimize database solutions using MySQL, MongoDB, DynamoDB, PostgreSQL, or similar technologies.

Project Management: - Coordinate internal resources and third-party vendors to deliver projects on time and within scope. - Define clear project scopes and objectives, involving all relevant stakeholders. - Develop detailed project plans, track progress, and manage changes in scope, schedule, and costs. - Track project performance to analyze the achievement of short and long-term goals.

Collaboration and Communication: - Ensure alignment among technical and business teams for successful delivery. - Communicate project status, risks, and resolutions effectively to stakeholders. - Foster a culture of learning, adaptability, and continuous improvement.

Qualifications and Skills:

Required: - 5-7 years of experience in DevOps and Open Source culture with a strong focus on CI/CD. - At least 3 years of hands-on experience with Dockerization and Kubernetes. - Proficiency in Linux Administration and microservice-based application deployments. - Expert knowledge of IaC tools like Terraform, Ansible, or CloudFormation. - Advanced experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and their orchestration services (EKS, AKS, GKE). - Strong knowledge of Git workflows and version control systems. - Familiarity with logging, monitoring, and tracing tools like ELK, Prometheus, and Grafana. - Hands-on experience with scripting languages such as Bash, Python, or Go.

Preferred: - Strong understanding of database technologies such as MySQL, MongoDB, DynamoDB, and PostgreSQL. - Quick learner with the ability to adapt to new technologies rapidly. - Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@urolime.com
summary: Seeking an experienced DevOps Solution Architect to lead projects, manage CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud platforms. Requires strong project management and collaboration skills.

job_description:
Senior AI/ML Engineer

About Techversant:

Techversant is a global technology services and solution’s company providing high-quality end-to-end IT Solutions and Services to its clients across the globe for more than 17 years. Techversant has been providing Technology services in the key areas of Digital Transformation, Understanding the Evolving Industrial Scenarios, Investment Priorities and Technology Disruption.

We offer expertise and consultation in multiple technology domains like – ColdFusion, Python, Java, .NET, Node JS, Ruby on Rails, Golang, PHP, Artificial intelligence, Blockchain, IOS, Android, Flutter, React Native, Angular, React Vue, etc., catering to various industry verticals globally.

What’s Important to Us:

We are seeking experienced AI/ML Engineers who will be responsible for developing and driving new business opportunities internationally. The incumbent will be responsible for discovering sales opportunities and creating qualified leads.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop ML and Deep Learning Solutions: Create predictive, classification, and optimization models using supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning.
  • Design and Implement Generative AI Systems: Build and fine-tune Large Language Models (LLMs) and diffusion models for a range of use cases involving text, code, and multi-modal data.
  • Build Scalable Recommendation Engines: Develop and optimize recommendation systems using collaborative filtering, content-based filtering, hybrid models, or sequential models.
  • Cloud-Native ML Engineering: Deploy and manage machine learning pipelines and APIs in cloud environments (AWS, GCP, Azure), ensuring scalability, observability, and cost efficiency.
  • End-to-End ML Lifecycle Ownership: Own the model lifecycle from feature engineering and experimentation to deployment, CI/CD, monitoring, and iteration.
  • Collaborate Across Functions: Work with cross-functional teams including product managers, engineers, and data scientists to translate business goals into AI-powered solutions.

Core Requirements:

  • Minimum 4 years of experience in building and deploying production-level ML/DL systems.
  • Develop proofs of concept AI/ML-based solutions and services and demonstrate them to Business stakeholders.
  • Design and deliver ML architecture patterns operable in native and hybrid cloud architectures.
  • Create functional and technical specifications for AI/ML solutions.
  • Implement machine learning algorithms in services and pipelines that can be used on a web scale.
  • Design, develop, and implement Generative AI models using state-of-the-art techniques.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project goals, research requirements, and develop innovative solutions.
  • Strong understanding of transformer architectures and deep learning model design.
  • Hands-on experience in building at least one production-grade Deep Learning solution or Generative AI solution.
  • Expertise in Python programming with a focus on:
    • Code optimization and profiling
    • Multi-threading and multiprocessing
    • Object-oriented programming and design principles
  • Experience deploying models in a cloud-native environment with strong MLOps practices.
  • Understanding of model evaluation, observability, A/B testing, and feedback loops.
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
  • Strong communication and presentation skills.

Technical Stack:

  • Languages: Excellent understanding of object-oriented concepts and Python.
  • ML/DL Frameworks:
    • Machine Learning: Scikit-learn, XGBoost, LightGBM
    • Deep Learning: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras
    • GenAI: Hugging Face Transformers, LangChain, OpenAI APIs, Gemini, Agentic Framework
  • Cloud & MLOps: AWS SageMaker, GCP Vertex AI, Azure ML, MLflow, Kubeflow, Docker, Kubernetes
  • Data & Compute: Apache Spark, BigQuery, RabbitMQ, S3, EC2
  • Embedding Stores & Vector Search: FAISS, Pinecone, ChromaDB
  • Orchestration & APIs: Apache Airflow, Docker Deployment, and FastAPI are a must.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience with multi-modal models combining text, vision, or audio.
  • Familiarity with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), embedding stores, and agent-based orchestration (LangGraph, ReAct).
  • Open-source contributions in AI/ML or GenAI ecosystems.
  • Certifications in cloud-based machine learning platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure).

Education:

  • B.Tech / M.Tech / Ph.D. in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or a related field.
  • Equivalent practical experience in developing scalable AI solutions will also be considered.

What Company Offers:

  • Excellent career growth opportunities and exposure to multiple technologies.
  • Fixed weekday day schedule, meaning, you’ll have your weekends off!
  • Family Medical Insurance.
  • Unique leave benefits and encashment options based on performance.
  • Long term growth opportunities.
  • Fun family environment surrounded by experienced developers.
  • Various internal employee rewards programs based on Performance.
  • Opportunities for various other Bonus programs – for training hours taken, certifications, special value to business through idea and innovation.
  • Work life Balance – flexible work timings, early out Fridays, various social and cultural activities etc.
  • Company Sponsored International Tours.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@techversantinfotech.com
summary: Seeking experienced AI/ML Engineers to develop and drive international business opportunities. Responsibilities include building ML/DL solutions, generative AI systems, and scalable recommendation engines.

job_description:
Technical Architect - AI/ML

About Techversant:

Techversant is a global technology services and solution’s company providing high-quality end-to-end IT Solutions and Services to its clients across the globe for more than 17 years. Techversant has been providing Technology services in the key areas of Digital Transformation, Understanding the Evolving Industrial Scenarios, Investment Priorities and Technology Disruption.

We offer expertise and consultation in multiple technology domains like – ColdFusion, Python, Java, .NET, Node JS, Ruby on Rails, Golang, PHP, Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain, IOS, Android, Flutter, React Native, Angular, React Vue, etc., catering to various industry verticals globally.

What’s important to us:

We are looking for a visionary yet hands-on AI Solution Architect who thrives at the intersection of technology, business, and innovation. This is a client-facing leadership role for someone who can conceptualize, design, and deliver robust AI-driven applications while staying ahead of the curve with emerging AI trends and technologies. You will be responsible for the entire lifecycle of AI solution development – from client discussions and requirements analysis to architecture design, algorithm selection, solution development, team guidance, and successful delivery.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Client Engagement & Consulting
    • Interact directly with clients and stakeholders to understand complex business problems.
    • Translate business needs into AI/ML opportunities and articulate solution strategies clearly.
    • Present solution architectures, effort estimates, timelines, and potential ROI.
  • Solution Design & Architecture
    • Define end-to-end AI architecture including data pipelines, model selection, AI engines, integration layers, APIs, and deployment strategies.
    • Make informed choices of AI/ML/DL algorithms, frameworks, and platforms based on problem type and constraints.
    • Ensure the architecture is scalable, modular, secure, and optimized for performance.
  • Hands-On Development
    • Develop critical components or proof-of-concepts when needed.
    • Perform hands-on design and coding for pipelines, model training, inferencing, or integrations.
    • Create reusable components and automation scripts for repeatability.
  • Team Leadership & Delivery Oversight
    • Build and mentor a high-performing AI development team.
    • Drive agile development cycles, ensuring timely and quality delivery.
    • Collaborate with DevOps, Product Managers, and QA teams throughout SDLC.

Must-Have Skills:

  • AI/ML/DL Expertise:
    • Proven experience with supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning.
    • Deep knowledge of ML algorithms (e.g., XGBoost, SVM, Random Forest) and DL architectures (CNNs, RNNs, Transformers, LLMs).
    • Hands-on with Python, PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras, Scikit-learn, Hugging Face, etc.
  • Architecture & System Design:
    • Strong grasp on designing large-scale AI/ML pipelines using microservices, APIs, and cloud-native architecture.
    • Experience designing MLOps workflows (CI/CD for ML) using tools like MLflow, Kubeflow, Airflow, DVC.
  • Cloud & Platforms:
    • Proficient in AWS/GCP/Azure AI/ML services (e.g., SageMaker, Vertex AI, Azure ML Studio).
    • Familiarity with vector databases (e.g., FAISS, Pinecone), model versioning, and deployment strategies (e.g., REST APIs, gRPC, containers, Kubernetes).
  • Data Engineering:
    • Working knowledge of data wrangling, preprocessing, ETL, feature engineering, data versioning.
    • Tools: Spark, Pandas, Snowflake, Kafka, Databricks, Delta Lake.
  • Product & Project Ownership:
    • Ability to estimate efforts, manage scope, and align delivery with client expectations.
    • Experience in productizing AI models and integrating them into full-stack applications.
  • Soft Skills:
    • Excellent communication, stakeholder management, and presentation skills.
    • Ability to simplify complex AI concepts for non-technical stakeholders.

Preferred/Nice-to-Have:

  • Experience with Generative AI (LLMs, GPT, BERT, Stable Diffusion, LangChain, RAG, etc.)
  • Knowledge of Prompt Engineering, Fine-Tuning, and RLHF
  • Experience in NLP, Computer Vision, Time Series, or Recommendation Engines
  • Understanding of ethical AI, explainable AI, and compliance in AI systems
  • Publications, contributions to open-source, or AI certifications

Education:

  • Bachelor’s or master’s degree in computer science, Data Science, AI, or related fields.

Techversant is a global technology services and solution’s company providing high-quality end-to-end IT Solutions and Services to its clients across the globe for more than 17 years.   • Architect Solutions: Design and implement scalable, maintainable, and secure application architectures, ensuring alignment with best practices and industry standards.
  • Full-Stack Development: Lead the design, development, and maintenance of both front-end and back-end web applications using Angular or React, and Node.js.
  • Cloud Integration: Build, deploy, and manage applications on AWS or Azure, utilizing services like Lambda, EC2, S3, RDS, API Gateway, etc., to ensure scalability and high availability.
  • API Development: Develop and integrate RESTful APIs and GraphQL services to support front-end applications and other backend services.
  • Mentorship and Leadership: Mentor junior and mid-level developers, providing technical guidance and leadership to ensure high-quality code and development best practices.
  • Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with UX/UI designers, product managers, and QA teams to deliver outstanding user experiences and ensure project deadlines are met.
  • Performance Optimization: Continuously monitor and optimize application performance, both on the client-side and server-side, to provide a seamless user experience.

  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines, Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform for containerization and infrastructure management.
  • Strong understanding of software design patterns, microservices architecture, and agile development methodologies (e.g., Scrum, Kanban).
  • Ability to write clean, maintainable, and efficient code with a focus on test-driven development (TDD) and continuous integration.
  • Experience with front-end optimization techniques, including bundling, lazy loading, code splitting, and caching.
  • TypeScript experience and fluency.
  • Familiarity with serverless architectures (AWS Lambda, Azure Functions).
  • Experience with message brokers (e.g., RabbitMQ, Kafka) for event-driven architectures.
  • Experience with Agile/Scrum methodologies, and leading cross-functional teams.

    • Define end-to-end AI architecture, including data pipelines, model selection, AI engines, integration layers, APIs, and deployment strategies.

    • Build and mentor a high-performing AI development team.

    • Collaborate with DevOps, Product Managers, and QA teams throughout the SDLC.

  • Architecture & System Design:

  • Data Engineering:

    • Experience with tools like Spark, Pandas, Snowflake, Kafka, Databricks, Delta Lake.
  • Product & Project Ownership:

    • Experience in productizing AI models and integrating them into full-stack applications.
  • Soft Skills:
    • Excellent communication, stakeholder management, and presentation skills.

job_description:
DevOps Engineer

About the Job

As a specialist in electronics and software for the past 20 years, in-tech is a dynamic, fast-growing engineering company headquartered in Munich, Germany, employing around 2350 employees globally across 20 project locations in 8 countries.

in-tech develops innovative engineering solutions for the automotive, rail, aerospace, defence, and industrial sectors. We are committed to a flexible, modern work culture and work-life balance. Our colour orange stands for liveliness, warmth, and dynamism. We value a strong team spirit, fresh ideas, and a positive work culture. We call it the “Orange Spirit”!

Since 2024, in-tech became a subsidiary of Infosys Ltd. This strategic partnership enables us to offer our customers even more comprehensive development and digitalisation services and greater offshore capability.

We are looking for a DevOps Engineer to join our team, based out of our Kochi location with hybrid work options. If you’re passionate about joining a growing and dynamic team with a company with a positive culture and team spirit, we’d love to connect with you!

Responsibilities

  1. Responsibility and operation of the DevSecOps infrastructure.
  2. Proxmox and Proxmox backup infrastructure.
  3. GitHub Cloud and On-Premises (Enterprise License).
  4. GitHub Runner On-Premises (Windows, Mac dedicated hardware, Linux).
  5. Artifactory, including selection and migration to alternative solutions that also support the performance of security checks, e.g., based on SBOMs.
  6. Development and implementation of CI/CD solutions.
  7. Supporting the development and project teams with CI/CD processes and specific tooling.
  8. Setting up and managing databases.
  9. Setup and administration of virtual machines in project networks.
  10. Linking project networks to customer networks, including communication and coordination with customer IT.
  11. Migration and optimization of tools and solutions, including security checks.

Requirements

  1. Minimum 4+ years of experience.
  2. Vocational training as an IT specialist for system integration or application development, or a comparable qualification.
  3. Experience in network administration (IP, subnetworks, firewall configuration, etc.).
  4. Good knowledge of common operating systems (Windows, Linux/Unix) both as a user and as an administrator.
  5. Knowledge and experience in programming, scripting, and automation (e.g., Python, Bash, PowerShell, or similar technologies).
  6. Experience with CI/CD tools and environments (GitHub).
  7. Knowledge of cloud platforms and container technologies (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
  8. Experience with tools such as Kubernetes, Docker Swarm, or similar technologies.
  9. Knowledge of the administration and maintenance of SQL and NoSQL databases.
  10. Ability to develop solutions independently and autonomously.
  11. Strong communication and coordination skills, especially when dealing with customer IT (e.g., BMW, Volkswagen).

Apply with us

If you have experience and team spirit and are looking for a great place to work, then start your job with us.

As part of our dedication to the diversity of our workforce, in-tech is committed to equal employment opportunity without regard for age, race, colour, national origin, ethnicity, gender, protected veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, or religion.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at india.talent@in-tech.com

job_description:
Senior Techno-Functional Project Manager

About Fingent

At Fingent, we believe that technology can make a meaningful difference to the lives around us. We create and provide software that is beautiful, usable, and compelling to solve complex business challenges. We nurture smart people who bring out the best in themselves, their peers, and their clients. We are looking for an experienced Senior Techno-Functional Project Manager to join our Project Management Office (PMO) and help us continue our mission.

Key Responsibilities

As a Senior Techno-Functional Project Manager, you will be a key player in bridging the gap between business needs and technical solutions. You will be responsible for the full project lifecycle, ensuring successful delivery from conceptualization to completion. Your day-to-day responsibilities will include:

  • Acting as a trusted advisor to clients, quickly understanding their business processes, workflows, roles, and needs, and translating them into comprehensive business analysis documents that identify appropriate software features and functionality.
  • Conceptualizing and presenting solutions to clients, creating detailed user scenarios, workflows, and wireframes to illustrate your vision. Secure buy-in.
  • Evaluating and recommending off-the-shelf or open source solutions that can address customer challenges or technical requirements, either wholly or partially, to optimize project delivery and cost-effectiveness.
  • Collaborating with our design experts to create mockups that effectively communicate solution recommendations.
  • Guiding technical decisions in close collaboration with Development, DevOps, and QA managers, ensuring scalability, security, and maintainability of applications. Engaging with architects and developers to resolve issues and mitigate risks early.
  • Mentoring and developing senior business analysts, fostering their growth in requirements gathering, stakeholder management, and solution design.
  • Serving as a central point of communication, ensuring transparency and alignment between internal teams and external stakeholders throughout the project.
  • Building strong relationships with business stakeholders, product owners, and cross-functional teams to align on objectives, priorities, and expectations.
  • Proactively monitoring project progress, identifying potential risks and issues, and reporting them promptly.
  • Managing and documenting changes to the project scope, and communicating their impact to clients and relevant stakeholders.
  • Ensuring projects are delivered on time, within budget, and to the agreed-upon scope.
  • Handling multiple projects and priorities simultaneously in a fast-paced environment while consistently delivering high-quality results.

Qualifications & Experience

To excel in this role, you should possess a blend of technical knowledge, strong communication skills, and a strategic mindset.

  • Education: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • Experience: 12+ years of IT experience with at least 5 years in project management or similar leadership roles.
  • Technical Acumen: able to discuss architectures, APIs, data models, and cloud/SaaS patterns.
  • Team Leadership: Proven track record of managing distributed development teams across different time zones.
  • Communication & Negotiation: Exceptional communication, negotiation, and stakeholder management skills.
  • Domain Experience (Preferred): Experience in one or more of the following domains is an added advantage: Logistics, Aviation, Supply Chain Management, or Insurance.

Required Skills

  • Project Management Expertise: A solid understanding of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and various project management methodologies.
  • Business Analysis Acumen: Mandatory experience in software requirements analysis with the ability to create detailed, well-documented requirements and quickly grasp customer business processes.
  • Solution Architecture: Ability to evaluate and recommend commercial off-the-shelf (COTS) or open source solutions alongside custom development options.
  • Critical Thinking: Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to think critically to navigate complex challenges and make informed decisions.
  • Interpersonal Skills: The ability to build strong relationships with clients and team members, fostering a collaborative and productive project environment.
  • Mentorship: Experience in coaching and developing business analysts and junior team members.

More Information

  • Experience: 10 - 15 Years

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@fingent.com
summary: Senior Techno-Functional Project Manager needed to bridge business needs and technical solutions. Manage full project lifecycle, client advisory, and team collaboration.

Brief Description

The Pre-Sales Network Engineer will play a key role in supporting the sales team by providing technical expertise, designing networking solutions, and ensuring that proposed solutions meet customer requirements. The candidate will work closely with clients to understand their IT infrastructure needs, recommend suitable networking products, and assist in closing deals through strong technical presentations and demonstrations.

Key Responsibilities

  • Collaborate with the Sales team to identify customer requirements and propose suitable networking solutions.
  • Design, configure, and present IT networking solutions (Routing, Switching, Wireless, Network Security, SDN, etc.).
  • Prepare technical proposals, network diagrams, and Bills of Materials (BOM).
  • Participate in pre-sales activities such as customer meetings, RFI/RFP responses, and Proof of Concepts (PoC).
  • Deliver technical presentations and product demonstrations to customers.
  • Provide consultation and technical guidance to customers throughout the pre-sales cycle.
  • Stay updated with the latest networking technologies, vendor offerings, and industry trends.
  • Coordinate with internal product and engineering teams to communicate customer needs and feedback.
  • Train and support the sales team with technical knowledge and solution insights.

Preferred Skills

Technical Skills

  • Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, IT, Electronics, or related field.
  • 1-3 years of experience in Pre-Sales, Network Engineering, or Solution Design roles.
  • Strong understanding of TCP/IP, Routing Protocols (OSPF, BGP), Switching, VLANs, VPNs, QoS, and SDN concepts.
  • Hands-on experience with networking products (Cisco, Juniper, Fortinet, Arista, etc.).
  • Basic knowledge of network security (Firewalls, IDS/IPS, Zero Trust).
  • Ability to create solution documentation – diagrams, proposals, and presentations.
  • Preferred Certifications: CCNP, JNCIP, Fortinet NSE, or equivalent professional certifications.

Soft Skills

  • Excellent communication and presentation skills.
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical abilities.
  • Customer-focused with a consultative approach.
  • Ability to work collaboratively with Sales and Technical teams.
  • Strong time management and organizational skills.

job_description:
Technical Architect - AI/ML

Company: Techversant Infotech (P) Ltd Location: Trivandrum, Kerala Contact Email: careers@techversantinfotech.com Website: http://www.techversantinfotech.com Published Date: 29, Oct 2025 Closing Date: 04 Nov 2025

About Techversant:

Techversant is a global technology services and solutions company with over 17 years of experience providing high-quality end-to-end IT solutions. We specialize in Digital Transformation, understanding evolving industrial scenarios, investment priorities, and technology disruption. Our expertise spans numerous technology domains including ColdFusion, Python, Java, .NET, Node JS, Ruby on Rails, Golang, PHP, Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain, iOS, Android, Flutter, React Native, Angular, React, and Vue, catering to diverse industry verticals worldwide.

About the Role:

We are seeking a visionary and hands-on AI Solution Architect who excels at the intersection of technology, business, and innovation. This client-facing leadership role requires conceptualizing, designing, and delivering robust AI-driven applications while staying abreast of emerging AI trends. You will oversee the entire AI solution development lifecycle, from client discussions and requirements analysis to architecture design, algorithm selection, solution development, team guidance, and successful delivery.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Client Engagement & Consulting

    • Interact directly with clients and stakeholders to understand complex business problems.
    • Translate business needs into AI/ML opportunities and articulate solution strategies clearly.
    • Present solution architectures, effort estimates, timelines, and potential ROI.

  • Solution Design & Architecture

    • Define end-to-end AI architecture, including data pipelines, model selection, AI engines, integration layers, APIs, and deployment strategies.
    • Select appropriate AI/ML/DL algorithms, frameworks, and platforms based on problem type and constraints.
    • Ensure architecture is scalable, modular, secure, and optimized for performance.

  • Hands-On Development

    • Develop critical components or proof-of-concepts as needed.
    • Perform hands-on design and coding for pipelines, model training, inferencing, or integrations.
    • Create reusable components and automation scripts for repeatability.

  • Team Leadership & Delivery Oversight

    • Build and mentor a high-performing AI development team.
    • Drive agile development cycles, ensuring timely and quality delivery.
    • Collaborate with DevOps, Product Managers, and QA teams throughout the SDLC.

Preferred Skills:

  • AI/ML/DL Expertise:
    • Proven experience with supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning.
    • Deep knowledge of ML algorithms (e.g., XGBoost, SVM, Random Forest) and DL architectures (CNNs, RNNs, Transformers, LLMs).
    • Hands-on experience with Python, PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras, Scikit-learn, Hugging Face.
  • Architecture & System Design:
    • Strong grasp of designing large-scale AI/ML pipelines using microservices, APIs, and cloud-native architecture.
    • Experience designing MLOps workflows (CI/CD for ML) using tools like MLflow, Kubeflow, Airflow, DVC.
  • Cloud & Platforms:
    • Proficiency in AWS/GCP/Azure AI/ML services (e.g., SageMaker, Vertex AI, Azure ML Studio).
    • Familiarity with vector databases (e.g., FAISS, Pinecone), model versioning, and deployment strategies (e.g., REST APIs, gRPC, containers, Kubernetes).
  • Data Engineering:
    • Working knowledge of data wrangling, preprocessing, ETL, feature engineering, data versioning.
    • Tools: Spark, Pandas, Snowflake, Kafka, Databricks, Delta Lake.
  • Product & Project Ownership:
    • Ability to estimate efforts, manage scope, and align delivery with client expectations.
    • Experience in productizing AI models and integrating them into full-stack applications.
  • Soft Skills:
    • Excellent communication, stakeholder management, and presentation skills.
    • Ability to simplify complex AI concepts for non-technical stakeholders.

Preferred/Nice-to-Have:

  • Experience with Generative AI (LLMs, GPT, BERT, Stable Diffusion, LangChain, RAG, etc.).
  • Knowledge of Prompt Engineering, Fine-Tuning, and RLHF.
  • Experience in NLP, Computer Vision, Time Series, or Recommendation Engines.
  • Understanding of ethical AI, explainable AI, and compliance in AI systems.
  • Publications, contributions to open-source, or AI certifications.

Education:

  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, AI, or related fields.
  • Certifications in Cloud AI/ML platforms or advanced AI specializations are a plus.

What the Company Offers:

  • Excellent career growth opportunities and exposure to multiple technologies.
  • Fixed weekday day schedule (weekends off).
  • Family Medical Insurance.
  • Unique leave benefits and encashment options based on performance.
  • Long-term growth opportunities.
  • Fun family environment with experienced developers.
  • Various internal employee rewards programs based on performance.
  • Opportunities for bonus programs (training hours, certifications, idea contribution).
  • Work-life balance (flexible timings, early out Fridays, social/cultural activities).
  • Company-sponsored international tours.
summary: Lead AI Solution Architect role focusing on client engagement, end-to-end AI architecture design, and team leadership. Requires strong AI/ML expertise and cloud proficiency.

  • Cloud Integration: Build, deploy, and manage applications on AWS or Azure, utilizing services like Lambda, EC2, S3, RDS, API Gateway, etc., to ensure scalability and high availability.
  • API Development: Develop and integrate RESTful APIs and GraphQL services to support front-end applications and other backend services.
  • Mentorship and Leadership: Mentor junior and mid-level developers, providing technical guidance and leadership to ensure high-quality code and development best practices.
  • Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with UX/UI designers, product managers, and QA teams to deliver outstanding user experiences and ensure project deadlines are met.
  • Performance Optimization: Continuously monitor and optimize application performance, both on the client-side and server-side, to provide a seamless user experience.

  • Code Reviews & Best Practices: Lead code reviews, enforce coding standards, and maintain high levels of test coverage (unit, integration, E2E).

Preferred Skills:

  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines, Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform for containerization and infrastructure management.
  • Strong understanding of software design patterns, microservices architecture, and agile development methodologies (e.g., Scrum, Kanban).
  • Ability to write clean, maintainable, and efficient code with a focus on test-driven development (TDD) and continuous integration.
  • Experience with front-end optimization techniques, including bundling, lazy loading, code splitting, and caching.
  • TypeScript experience and fluency.

Roles and Responsibilities

  1. Payroll Processing:

    • Ensure accurate and timely processing of payroll for employees, including reviewing timesheets, calculating overtime, deductions, and benefits.
    • Collaborate with finance and accounting departments to reconcile payroll discrepancies and resolve any issues.
    • Stay updated on payroll laws and regulations to ensure compliance and recommend process improvements.

  2. Performance Management:

    • Coordinate and assist in the performance management process, including goal-setting, performance evaluations, and feedback sessions.
    • Provide guidance to managers and employees on performance-related matters, including addressing performance concerns, developing performance improvement plans, and recognizing outstanding achievements.
    • Monitor and track performance metrics and provide reports to management for decision-making purposes.

  3. Employee Relations:

    • Serve as a point of contact for employee inquiries, concerns, and grievances, ensuring prompt and effective resolution.
    • Conduct investigations into employee complaints or misconduct allegations, maintaining confidentiality and adhering to legal requirements.
    • Provide guidance and support to managers in handling employee relations issues, including disciplinary actions, terminations, and workplace conflict resolution.

  4. HR Policies and Procedures:

    • Develop, implement, and communicate HR policies, procedures, and guidelines to ensure compliance with applicable laws and regulations.
    • Regularly review and update employee handbooks, HR manuals, and related documents.
    • Provide training and guidance to employees and managers on HR policies, procedures, and compliance requirements.

  5. Onboarding:

    • Conduct new employee orientations and ensure a smooth onboarding experience.

  6. HR Data Management and Reporting:

    • Maintain accurate and up-to-date employee records, including personal information, employment history, benefits enrollment, and performance evaluations.
    • Generate HR reports and metrics for management, providing insights and recommendations for improvement.
    • Ensure data integrity and confidentiality, complying with data protection regulations.

What’s important to us:

We are looking for a visionary yet hands-on AI Solution Architect who thrives at the intersection of technology, business, and innovation. This is a client-facing leadership role for someone who can conceptualize, design, and deliver robust AI-driven applications while staying ahead of the curve with emerging AI trends and technologies. You will be responsible for the entire lifecycle of AI solution development – from client discussions and requirements analysis to architecture design, algorithm selection, solution development, team guidance, and successful delivery.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Client Engagement & Consulting
    • Interact directly with clients and stakeholders to understand complex business problems.
    • Translate business needs into AI/ML opportunities and articulate solution strategies clearly.
    • Present solution architectures, effort estimates, timelines, and potential ROI.
  • Solution Design & Architecture
    • Define end-to-end AI architecture including data pipelines, model selection, AI engines, integration layers, APIs, and deployment strategies.
    • Make informed choices of AI/ML/DL algorithms, frameworks, and platforms based on problem type and constraints.
    • Ensure the architecture is scalable, modular, secure, and optimized for performance.
  • Hands-On Development
    • Develop critical components or proof-of-concepts when needed.
    • Perform hands-on design and coding for pipelines, model training, inferencing, or integrations.
    • Create reusable components and automation scripts for repeatability.
  • Team Leadership & Delivery Oversight
    • Build and mentor a high-performing AI development team.
    • Drive agile development cycles, ensuring timely and quality delivery.
    • Collaborate with DevOps, Product Managers, and QA teams throughout SDLC.

Preferred Skills:

  • Must-Have Skills:
    • AI/ML/DL Expertise: Proven experience with supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning. Deep knowledge of ML algorithms (e.g., XGBoost, SVM, Random Forest) and DL architectures (CNNs, RNNs, Transformers, LLMs). Hands-on with Python, PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras, Scikit-learn, Hugging Face, etc.
    • Architecture & System Design: Strong grasp on designing large-scale AI/ML pipelines using microservices, APIs, and cloud-native architecture. Experience designing MLOps workflows (CI/CD for ML) using tools like MLflow, Kubeflow, Airflow, DVC.
    • Cloud & Platforms: Proficient in AWS/GCP/Azure AI/ML services (e.g., SageMaker, Vertex AI, Azure ML Studio). Familiarity with vector databases (e.g., FAISS, Pinecone), model versioning, and deployment strategies (e.g., REST APIs, gRPC, containers, Kubernetes).
    • Data Engineering: Working knowledge of data wrangling, preprocessing, ETL, feature engineering, data versioning. Tools: Spark, Pandas, Snowflake, Kafka, Databricks, Delta Lake.
    • Product & Project Ownership: Ability to estimate efforts, manage scope, and align delivery with client expectations. Experience in productizing AI models and integrating them into full-stack applications.
    • Soft Skills: Excellent communication, stakeholder management, and presentation skills. Ability to simplify complex AI concepts for non-technical stakeholders.
  • Preferred/Nice-to-Have:
    • Experience with Generative AI (LLMs, GPT, BERT, Stable Diffusion, LangChain, RAG, etc.)
    • Knowledge of Prompt Engineering, Fine-Tuning, and RLHF
    • Experience in NLP, Computer Vision, Time Series, or Recommendation Engines
    • Understanding of ethical AI, explainable AI, and compliance in AI systems
    • Publications, contributions to open-source, or AI certifications

Education:

  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, AI, or related fields.
  • Certifications in Cloud AI/ML platforms or advanced AI specializations are a plus.

About Techversant:

Techversant is a global technology services and solutions company with over 17 years of experience, providing high-quality end-to-end IT solutions and services to clients worldwide. We specialize in Digital Transformation, understanding evolving industrial scenarios, investment priorities, and technology disruption. Our expertise spans multiple technology domains including ColdFusion, Python, Java, .NET, Node JS, Ruby on Rails, Golang, PHP, Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain, iOS, Android, Flutter, React Native, Angular, React, Vue, and more, catering to various industry verticals globally.

What’s Important to Us:

We are seeking experienced AI/ML Engineers to develop and drive new international business opportunities. The role involves discovering sales opportunities and creating qualified leads.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop ML and Deep Learning Solutions: Create predictive, classification, and optimization models using supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning.
  • Design and Implement Generative AI Systems: Build and fine-tune Large Language Models (LLMs) and diffusion models for various use cases involving text, code, and multi-modal data.
  • Build Scalable Recommendation Engines: Develop and optimize recommendation systems using collaborative filtering, content-based filtering, hybrid models, or sequential models.
  • Cloud-Native ML Engineering: Deploy and manage machine learning pipelines and APIs in cloud environments (AWS, GCP, Azure), ensuring scalability, observability, and cost efficiency.
  • End-to-End ML Lifecycle Ownership: Own the entire model lifecycle from feature engineering and experimentation to deployment, CI/CD, monitoring, and iteration.
  • Collaborate Across Functions: Work with cross-functional teams including product managers, engineers, and data scientists to translate business goals into AI-powered solutions.

Preferred Skills & Core Requirements:

  • Minimum 4 years of experience in building and deploying production-level ML/DL systems.
  • Develop proofs of concept AI/ML-based solutions and services and demonstrate them to Business stakeholders.
  • Design and deliver ML architecture patterns operable in native and hybrid cloud architectures.
  • Create functional and technical specifications for AI/ML solutions.
  • Implement machine learning algorithms in services and pipelines that can be used on a web scale.
  • Design, develop, and implement Generative AI models using state-of-the-art techniques.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project goals, research requirements, and develop innovative solutions.
  • Strong understanding of transformer architectures and deep learning model design.
  • Hands-on experience in building at least one production-grade Deep learning solution or Generative AI solution.
  • Expertise in Python programming with a focus on:
    • Code optimization and profiling
    • Multi-threading and multiprocessing
    • Object-oriented programming and design principles
  • Experience deploying models in a cloud-native environment with strong MLOps practices.
  • Understanding of model evaluation, observability, A/B testing, and feedback loops.
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
  • Strong communication and presentation skills.

Technical Stack:

  • Languages: Excellent understanding of object-oriented concepts and Python.
  • ML/DL Frameworks:
    • Machine Learning: Scikit-learn, XGBoost, LightGBM
    • Deep Learning: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras
    • GenAI: Hugging Face Transformers, LangChain, OpenAI APIs, Gemini, Agentic Framework
  • Cloud & MLOps: AWS SageMaker, GCP Vertex AI, Azure ML, MLflow, Kubeflow, Docker, Kubernetes
  • Data & Compute: Apache Spark, BigQuery, RabbitMQ, S3, EC2
  • Embedding Stores & Vector Search: FAISS, Pinecone, ChromaDB
  • Orchestration & APIs: Apache Airflow, Docker Deployment, and FastAPI are a must.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience with multi-modal models combining text, vision, or audio.
  • Familiarity with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), embedding stores, and agent-based orchestration (LangGraph, ReAct).
  • Open-source contributions in AI/ML or GenAI ecosystems.
  • Certifications in cloud-based machine learning platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure).

Education:

  • B.Tech / M.Tech / Ph.D. in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or a related field.
  • Equivalent practical experience in developing scalable AI solutions will also be considered.

What Company Offers:

  • Excellent career growth opportunities and exposure to multiple technologies.
  • Fixed weekday day schedule with weekends off.
  • Family Medical Insurance.
  • Unique leave benefits and encashment options based on performance.
  • Long-term growth opportunities.
  • Fun family environment surrounded by experienced developers.
  • Various internal employee rewards programs based on performance.
  • Opportunities for various bonus programs (training hours, certifications, innovation).
  • Work-life balance with flexible work timings, early out Fridays, and social/cultural activities.
  • Company-sponsored international tours.
summary: Seeking a Senior AI/ML Engineer to develop and deploy ML/DL solutions, including Generative AI systems and recommendation engines. Requires 4+ years of experience in cloud-native ML engineering and Python expertise.

Introduction

We are seeking experienced candidates with over 10 years of experience for the role of Senior Data Architect.

Job Description

A minimum of 10 years of experience in data engineering, encompassing the development and scaling of data warehouse and data lake platforms. The candidate should possess a strong background in Snowflake, demonstrating leadership in technical design, architecture, and implementation of complex data solutions.

Working Hours: 8 hours daily, with a few hours of overlap during the EST Time zone (mandatory for meetings). The working hours will be 12 PM - 9 PM IST.

Responsibilities:

  • Lead the design and architecture of data solutions leveraging Snowflake, ensuring scalability, performance, and reliability.
  • Oversee the implementation of data pipelines, ETL processes, and data governance frameworks within Snowflake environments.
  • Ensure efficient data extraction from SAP BW/ECC systems.
  • Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business requirements and translate them into technical specifications and data models.
  • Develop and maintain data architecture standards, guidelines, and best practices, including data governance principles and DataOps methodologies.
  • Provide technical guidance and mentorship to data engineering teams.
  • Conduct performance tuning and optimization of Snowflake databases and queries.
  • Stay updated on emerging trends and advancements in Snowflake, cloud data technologies, data governance, and DataOps practices.

Mandatory Skills:

  • Snowflake experience
  • Data Architecture experience
  • ETL process experience
  • Large Data migration solutioning experience

Preferred Skills:

Primary Skills:

  • Extensive experience in designing and implementing data solutions using Snowflake.
  • DBT experience.
  • Proficiency in data modeling, schema design, and optimization within Snowflake environments.
  • Strong understanding of cloud data warehousing concepts and best practices, particularly with Snowflake.
  • Expertise in Python/Java/Scala, SQL, ETL processes, and data integration techniques, with a focus on Snowflake.
  • Familiarity with other cloud platforms and data technologies (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP).
  • Demonstrated experience in implementing data governance frameworks and DataOps practices.
  • Familiarity with real-time streaming technologies and Change Data Capture (CDC) mechanisms.
  • Knowledge of data governance principles and DataOps methodologies.
  • Proven track record of architecting and delivering complex data solutions in cloud platforms/Snowflake.

Secondary Skills:

  • Understanding of SAP BW/ECC systems, including data extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL/ELT) processes.
  • Experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI) is a plus.
  • Experience in designing, developing, and implementing SAP ABAP programs, reports, interfaces, and enhancements.
  • Working experience in SAP environments.
  • Knowledge of data security and compliance standards.
  • Proficiency in SAP ABAP (Advanced Business Application Programming) development.
  • Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to convey complex technical concepts to juniors and non-technical stakeholders.
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
  • Ability to work effectively in a collaborative team environment and lead cross-functional initiatives.

We contact our candidates only through our official website or LinkedIn, and all employment-related emails are sent through the official HR email ID. Please contact careers@reflectionsinfos.com for any clarification or alerts on this subject.

job_description:
Solution Architect (Optimizely)

Company: Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd Location: 9A2, Carnival Technopark, Kariyavattom P.O, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India, 695581 Website: http://www.reflectionsglobal.com Contact Email: Careers@reflectionsinfos.com Job Published: 29, Oct 2025 Closing Date: 07, Nov 2025

Introduction

Reflections Info Systems is seeking a highly experienced Solution Architect with over 12 years of experience to lead a significant migration project. This role is critical for transitioning from SAP B2B to Optimizely Commerce Cloud, requiring a strong technical leader to define and implement a scalable, secure, and future-ready architecture.

Job Description

This position involves serving as the technical leader for a large-scale migration from SAP B2B to Optimizely Commerce Cloud. The ideal candidate possesses deep expertise in enterprise commerce systems, cloud architecture, and system integrations. Responsibilities include guiding development teams, ensuring adherence to best practices in solution design, and taking full ownership of the architecture and development transition from the vendor.

Responsibilities:

Architecture & Design

  • Define the end-to-end migration architecture from SAP B2B to Optimizely, including CMS, Commerce, and PIM integration.
  • Design scalable, secure, and high-performance frameworks aligned with business goals.
  • Establish data migration strategies for products, pricing, and customer hierarchies.
  • Ensure API integration between SAP, Optimizely, and other enterprise systems.

Technical Leadership

  • Lead and mentor development teams on best practices and coding standards.
  • Collaborate with Optimizely consultants and internal teams to validate feasibility and technical approach.
  • Drive DevOps strategy for CI/CD pipelines, containerization, and cloud deployment.

Project Ownership

  • Act as the technical owner of the migration project, taking over from the vendor after initial phases.
  • Ensure alignment with enterprise security and compliance standards.
  • Provide technical guidance during feasibility analysis and pilot module migration.

Collaboration & Communication

  • Work closely with Business Analysts to translate requirements into technical solutions.
  • Communicate architecture decisions to stakeholders and leadership in business-friendly terms.
  • Support QA teams with test strategy for performance, integration, and security.

Preferred Skills

Primary Skills:

Technical Expertise

  • SAP B2B Architecture: Deep understanding of SAP Commerce Cloud, Back Office, and integration patterns.
  • B2B Platform: Hands-on experience with CMS and Commerce Cloud platforms, specifically Optimizely.
  • Optimizely PIM & Spire: Strong knowledge of Optimizely Product Information Management (PIM) and Spire framework.
  • .NET Development: Proficient in .NET Core and ASP.NET.
  • Cloud Architecture: Strong knowledge of Azure PaaS.
  • Azure Active Directory: Experience with identity and access management.
  • API Design & Integration: Skilled in RESTful services, SAP APIs, and Optimizely endpoints.
  • Frontend Development: Strong React expertise with CMS integration experience.

Architectural Leadership

  • Modern Architecture Concepts: Experience with monolithic and microservices-based systems.
  • Solution Architecture Design: Ability to design scalable, secure, and maintainable frameworks.
  • System Integration: Expertise in bridging SAP and Optimizely platforms.
  • Performance & Scalability: Planning for optimized performance and future growth.
  • Security & Compliance: Knowledge of enterprise-grade security and regulatory standards.

Project Ownership

  • End-to-End Leadership: Proven ability to lead projects from blueprint to execution.
  • Vendor Transition: Skilled in taking over architecture and development from external consultants.
  • Stakeholder Communication: Capable of translating technical decisions into business value.

Secondary Skills:

Technical Enhancements

  • GraphQL & Headless CMS Architecture: Beneficial for modern commerce experiences.
  • DevOps & CI/CD Pipelines: Experience with Azure DevOps or GitHub Actions.
  • Containerization: Familiarity with Docker and Kubernetes.

Soft Skills:

  • Team Mentoring & Coaching: Experienced in guiding developers.
  • Agile Methodology: Skilled in managing sprints and iterative delivery.
  • Analytical Thinking & Problem-Solving: Strong capability in feasibility analysis and resolving challenges.
  • Continuous Learning Mindset: Proactively stays updated with evolving trends.

How to Apply

Interested candidates are requested to forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com along with their notice period, current and expected CTC details.

Important Notice Regarding Fraudulent Job Offers

It has come to our attention that some individuals are fraudulently offering jobs with Reflections Info Systems for a fee. Please be advised that Reflections Info Systems never seeks payment for job opportunities. We only contact candidates through our official website or LinkedIn. All official employment-related communications will be sent from our official HR email address. For any clarification or to report suspicious activity, please contact careers@reflectionsinfos.com.
summary: Seeking an experienced Solution Architect for a SAP B2B to Optimizely migration. Must have 12+ years of experience in enterprise commerce, cloud architecture, and system integrations.

job_description:
Business Analyst

Company: Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd Location: 9A2, Carnival Technopark, Kariyavattom P.O, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India, 695581 Website: http://www.reflectionsglobal.com Contact Email: Careers@reflectionsinfos.com Job Published: October 29, 2025 Closing Date: November 07, 2025

Introduction

Reflections Info Systems is seeking experienced candidates for the role of Business Analyst.

Job Description

We are looking for a Business Analyst with deep expertise in B2B commerce and significant experience in Optimizely and other enterprise commerce platforms. The BA will be instrumental in eliciting requirements, crafting user stories, and providing guidance to development and QA teams throughout the migration process. This role is crucial for ensuring that business objectives are effectively translated into technical deliverables and for driving a successful migration from SAP B2B to Optimizely.

Responsibilities:

  • Collaborate with stakeholders to meticulously define the migration scope and detailed requirements.
  • Document functional requirements, user stories, and acceptance criteria with precision.
  • Work closely with architects, developers, and QA teams to ensure seamless alignment throughout the project lifecycle.
  • Support feasibility analysis and the pilot module migration phase.
  • Act as a subject matter expert for B2B workflows during the migration process.

Preferred Skills

Primary Skills: Technical Expertise

  • Strong knowledge of B2B commerce processes, including pricing, catalogs, customer hierarchies, and workflows.
  • Experience with Optimizely Commerce Cloud or similar enterprise platforms such as SAP Commerce Cloud, Salesforce Commerce Cloud.
  • Understanding of Content Management Systems (CMS) and Product Information Management (PIM) systems and their integration within e-commerce ecosystems.
  • Proficiency in API and integration knowledge, with the ability to work effectively with RESTful APIs and data mapping.
  • Hands-on experience in writing detailed functional specifications and user stories for complex commerce systems.

Non-Technical

  • Excellent requirement gathering and documentation skills; ability to translate business needs into clear, actionable user stories.
  • Strong communication and stakeholder management capabilities, effectively bridging the gap between business and technical teams.
  • Experience with Agile methodologies, including working with Scrum teams, backlog grooming, and sprint planning.
  • Demonstrated ability to guide development and QA teams during implementation and testing phases.

Secondary Skills:

  • Experience with SAP B2B systems, including familiarity with SAP Commerce Cloud modules and workflows.
  • Knowledge of the Optimizely Spire framework and headless architecture.
  • Understanding of cloud platforms such as Azure or AWS for commerce deployments.
  • Exposure to data migration projects, including mapping product, pricing, and customer data.
  • Basic knowledge of QA processes and test case validation.

Soft Skills:

  • Analytical Thinking: Ability to dissect complex business processes into clear, concise requirements.
  • Problem-Solving: Aptitude for quick resolution of ambiguities and project blockers.
  • Collaboration: Skill in working effectively with cross-functional teams (business, technical, QA).
  • Adaptability: Comfort in managing changing priorities and evolving project scopes.
  • Influencing Skills: Ability to gain stakeholder buy-in and guide decision-making effectively.
  • Attention to Detail: Commitment to ensuring accuracy in all requirements and documentation.
  • Time Management: Proficiency in prioritizing tasks and meeting deadlines in fast-paced environments.

Application Instructions

Interested candidates are requested to forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com. Please include your notice period, current, and expected CTC details.

Important Notice: Reflections Info Systems wishes to alert jobseekers to potential fraudulent activities where individuals may falsely promise jobs at our company for a fee. Please be aware that we never request payment for job opportunities. We communicate with candidates exclusively through our official website or LinkedIn. All employment-related emails will originate from our official HR email address. For any clarifications or to report any suspicious activity, please contact careers@reflectionsinfos.com.
summary: Business Analyst needed for B2B commerce migration to Optimizely. Requires 3+ years of experience in requirement elicitation and guiding development teams.

job_description:
Lead Full Stack Developer (FE/BE/React)

Company: Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd Location: 9A2, Carnival Technopark, Kariyavattom P.O, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India, 695581 Website: http://www.reflectionsglobal.com Contact Email: Careers@reflectionsinfos.com

Job Published: 29, Oct 2025 Closing Date: 07, Nov 2025

Brief Description

We are seeking a highly skilled Full Stack Developer with 8+ years of experience to lead the end-to-end migration of our B2B platform to Optimizely. This role demands deep technical expertise across front-end and back-end technologies, strong architectural understanding, and hands-on experience with e-commerce systems. The ideal candidate will drive the technical strategy, implementation, and integration efforts, ensuring a seamless transition from SAP ECC to Optimizely Commerce.

Responsibilities:

  • Lead the full lifecycle of the B2B to Optimizely migration project, from planning to deployment.
  • Develop scalable, secure, and maintainable full-stack solutions.
  • Collaborate with architects, business analysts, QA, and DevOps teams to ensure alignment and delivery.
  • Design and implement RESTful APIs for seamless integration between SAP ECC and Optimizely.
  • Ensure high performance and responsiveness of applications across browsers and devices.
  • Integrate and optimize PIM (Product Information Management) and Spire systems within the e-commerce ecosystem.
  • Implement CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment using Azure DevOps or GitHub Actions.
  • Maintain documentation and provide technical leadership and mentoring to junior developers.

Preferred Skills:

Primary Skills:

Front-End (React): - React.js (Hooks, Context API): Building scalable, component-based UIs. - JavaScript (ES6+) / TypeScript: Strong scripting and typing for maintainable code. - HTML5 / CSS3 / SASS: Responsive design and layout skills. - State Management: Redux or React Query for managing complex state. - API Integration: Consuming RESTful APIs securely and efficiently. - Cross-Browser Compatibility: Ensuring consistent UI behavior across platforms.

Back-End (.NET): - .NET Core / C#: Building scalable services and APIs for Optimizely. - Entity Framework / LINQ: Data access and manipulation. - RESTful API Design: Creating secure, performant endpoints for ECC-Optimizely integration. - Authentication & Authorization: OAuth2, JWT, role-based access control. - Database Design: SQL Server or PostgreSQL schema modeling and optimization.

Architecture & Integration: - Optimizely/EPIServer Platform Knowledge: Deep understanding of CMS and Commerce architecture. - SAP ECC Data Models: Familiarity with MARA, KNA1, VBAK, etc., for integration planning. - Middleware & Integration Patterns: Experience with Azure Logic Apps, MuleSoft, or Boomi. - Microservices Architecture: Designing loosely coupled services for scalability. - CI/CD Pipelines: Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions, or Jenkins for automated deployments. - Spire & PIM Integration: Experience integrating product and pricing data into e-commerce platforms.

Business & Domain Knowledge: - E-commerce Workflows: Product catalog, pricing, inventory, checkout. - B2B Commerce: Understanding of business customer journeys, bulk ordering, and account-based pricing.

Secondary Skills:

Front-End: - UI Frameworks: Material UI, Tailwind CSS, or Bootstrap. - Performance Optimization: Lazy loading, code splitting, caching strategies. - Accessibility (WCAG): Ensuring inclusive design.

Back-End: - GraphQL: For flexible data querying if used in Optimizely extensions. - Message Queues: RabbitMQ, Azure Service Bus for async processing. - Containerization: Docker, Kubernetes for deployment and scaling.

Integration & DevOps: - Monitoring & Logging: ELK stack, Application Insights, or Prometheus. - Security Best Practices: Data encryption, secure API design, GDPR compliance. - Test Automation Awareness: Understanding of unit, integration, and performance testing.

Business & Domain Knowledge: - SAP ECC Migration Strategy: Understanding of data extraction, transformation, and validation. - Stakeholder Communication: Translating technical decisions into business impact.

Soft Skills:

Leadership & Collaboration: - Solution Design: Translating business requirements into technical architecture. - Code Reviews & Mentorship: Guiding developers and enforcing best practices. - Agile Methodology: Working in sprints, managing backlog, and leading stand-ups.

Application Process: Interested candidates may forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com along with their notice period, current and expected CTC details.

Important Notice: Please be aware that some fraudsters may claim to offer jobs with Reflections Info Systems for a fee. Reflections Info Systems never asks for payment for job opportunities. We communicate with candidates solely through our official website or LinkedIn, and all employment-related emails originate from our official HR email address. For any clarification or alerts regarding this matter, please contact careers@reflectionsinfos.com.
summary: Lead Full Stack Developer sought for B2B platform migration to Optimizely. Requires 8+ years experience in React, .NET, and e-commerce systems for end-to-end migration leadership.

job_description:
Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET) - .NET

Company: Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd Location: 9A2, Carnival Technopark, Kariyavattom P.O, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India, 695581 Website: http://www.reflectionsglobal.com Contact Email: Careers@reflectionsinfos.com

Job Published: 29-Oct-2025 Closing Date: 07-Nov-2025

Introduction

Reflections Info Systems is seeking candidates with 3+ years of experience for the role of Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET). This position is crucial for ensuring the quality and reliability of our SAP B2B to Optimizely Commerce Cloud migration.

Job Description

The SDET role requires a blend of strong programming and Quality Assurance expertise to design, develop, and execute both automated and manual tests. The successful candidate will be responsible for validating functional workflows, API integrations, and data accuracy. Key responsibilities include building automation frameworks, integrating tests into CI/CD pipelines, and collaborating with development and business teams to deliver a robust and scalable solution.

Responsibilities:

  • Develop and maintain automated test suites using .NET Core/C#, Selenium, or Playwright.
  • Perform API testing for ECC-Optimizely integrations using Postman or RestSharp.
  • Validate migrated data using SQL queries and backend checks.
  • Implement unit and integration tests with xUnit, NUnit, or MSTest.
  • Set up and manage test pipelines in Azure DevOps or GitHub Actions.
  • Conduct functional, regression, and end-to-end testing for e-commerce workflows.
  • Perform performance testing using JMeter, k6, or similar tools.
  • Ensure secure API practices and perform basic security testing (OWASP awareness).
  • Collaborate in Agile teams, participate in sprint planning, and report defects in JIRA or Azure Boards.
  • Generate test reports using ExtentReports, Allure, or custom dashboards.

Preferred Skills:

Primary Skills: - Technical Testing: .NET Core / C# (strong programming for automation), API Testing (Postman, RestSharp, Swagger), Unit Testing Frameworks (xUnit, NUnit, MSTest), Test Automation (Selenium WebDriver, Playwright), SQL & Data Validation, CI/CD Integration (Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions, Jenkins). - Functional & Integration Testing: End-to-End Test Scenarios (product catalog, pricing, inventory, order workflows), Regression Testing, Error Handling & Logging. - Quality Practices: Test Strategy & Planning, Defect Management (JIRA, Azure Boards, TestRail), Version Control (Git).

Secondary Skills: - Performance & Security Testing: Load Testing Tools (JMeter, k6, Locust), Security Testing Basics (OWASP Top 10 awareness). - SAP ECC Awareness: Basic ABAP Understanding, ECC Data Models (MARA, KNA1, VBAK familiarity). - Optimizely Platform Familiarity: Optimizely Commerce Workflows, CMS Testing. - Collaboration & DevOps: Test Reporting Tools (Extent Reports, Allure), Agile Methodology.

Soft Skills:

  • Strong communication and documentation abilities.
  • Analytical thinking to identify edge cases and potential data issues.
  • Proactive collaboration with developers, business analysts, and stakeholders.

How to Apply:

Interested candidates are requested to forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com, including their notice period, current, and expected CTC details.

Important Notice Regarding Job Offers: Reflections Info Systems strictly prohibits any fees charged for job applications or offers. Be aware of potential fraudsters who may claim to represent the company and ask for payment. Reflections communicates solely through its official website and LinkedIn, and all official HR emails originate from our official HR email ID. For any clarifications or alerts regarding this matter, please contact careers@reflectionsinfos.com.
summary: Seeking an experienced SDET with .NET skills for SAP B2B to Optimizely migration. Responsibilities include test automation, API testing, CI/CD integration, and collaboration.

job_description:
Fullstack Developer (Optimizely)

Company: Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd Location: 9A2, Carnival Technopark, Kariyavattom P.O, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India , 695581 Website: http://www.reflectionsglobal.com

Job Published: 29, Oct 2025 Closing Date: 07, Nov 2025 Contact Email: Careers@reflectionsinfos.com

Introduction

We are looking for candidates with 3+ years of experience for this role.

Job Description

We are seeking a talented Full Stack Developer to contribute to the SAP B2B to Optimizely Commerce Cloud migration project. This role involves building and integrating front-end and back-end components for the Optimizely Commerce platform using React.js and .NET Core. The developer will work on integrations with Spire CMS and PIM systems, ensure smooth data exchange between SAP ECC and Optimizely, and focus on performance optimization, security, and deployment leveraging Azure services.

Responsibilities:

  • Develop responsive UIs using React.js/Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
  • Build and maintain backend services using .NET Core (C#) and ASP.NET Web API.
  • Integrate Spire CMS and PIM for B2B ecommerce workflows.
  • Implement secure RESTful APIs for SAP ECC–Optimizely integration.
  • Manage SQL Server databases and use Entity Framework Core for ORM.
  • Set up and maintain CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps or GitHub Actions.
  • Utilize Azure services (Logic Apps, API Management, Service Bus, Functions, Key Vault) for integration and security.
  • Ensure authentication via OAuth2/OpenID Connect and Azure AD.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams in an Agile environment.

Preferred Skills

B2B:

  • Experience with CMS platforms (Optimizely preferred): Understanding content modeling, workflows, personalization.
  • Experience with Commerce Cloud platforms: Familiarity with B2B commerce systems like SAP Commerce Cloud or Salesforce Commerce Cloud.

Frontend:

  • React.js / Next.js: For building modern, performant UIs.
  • TypeScript: For scalable and maintainable code.
  • Tailwind CSS / SASS: For styling.
  • Spire CMS (Must-Have): Deep understanding of Spire architecture for B2B ecommerce.

Backend:

  • .NET Core (C#): Essential for Optimizely backend development.
  • ASP.NET MVC / Web API: For building and exposing services.

Database:

  • SQL Server: Common in enterprise environments.
  • Entity Framework Core: ORM for .NET.

Integration & PIM:

  • PIM Integration Knowledge: Handling product data workflows and integration with Optimizely.
  • SAP ECC Data Models: Familiarity with MARA, KNA1, VBAK for integration planning.

DevOps & Deployment:

  • Azure DevOps / GitHub Actions: For CI/CD pipelines.
  • Docker & Kubernetes: For containerization and orchestration.
  • Azure Cloud Expertise: Logic Apps, API Management, Service Bus, Functions, Key Vault, DevOps (CI/CD), and Application Insights for SAP-Optimizely integration.

Authentication & Security:

  • OAuth2 / OpenID Connect.
  • Azure Active Directory for identity management.

Secondary Skills:

CMS Specific:

  • Optimizely CMS / Optimizely Commerce – Valuable but not mandatory if the developer has CMS experience.
  • Optimizely Graph – For headless CMS scenarios.

Frontend Enhancements:

  • Redux / Zustand – For state management.
  • Storybook – For UI component documentation.

Backend Enhancements:

  • GraphQL – For flexible data querying.
  • Redis – For caching.

Testing:

  • Jest / React Testing Library
  • xUnit / NUnit
  • Postman / Swagger

Monitoring & Analytics:

  • Application Insights
  • Google Tag Manager / GA4

Project Management:

  • Jira / Azure Boards
  • Confluence / Notion

Soft Skills:

  • Analytical Thinking: Designing scalable systems and solving complex logic problems.
  • Clear Communication: Explaining technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
  • Accountability: Taking ownership of data integrity, performance, and security.
  • Collaboration: Coordinating with FE developers, QA, and integration teams.

We are looking for a detail-oriented QA Analyst to ensure the quality, accuracy, and reliability of the SAP B2B to Optimizely Commerce Cloud migration. This role involves manual testing, validating functional workflows, data integrity, and user experience across platforms. The QA Analyst will collaborate with developers and business teams to identify and resolve defects, while contributing to test planning, execution, and reporting within an Agile environment.

Responsibilities:

Preferred Skills

Functional Testing: - Writing and executing manual test cases for Optimizely workflows (e.g., product catalog, pricing, inventory, checkout). - Performing UI validation across browsers and devices. - Logging and tracking defects using tools like JIRA, Azure DevOps, or TestRail. - Understanding Optimizely CMS/Commerce basics to validate content and commerce flows.

Data Migration Testing: - Validating data accuracy, completeness, and consistency between SAP ECC and Optimizely. - Familiarity with SAP ECC data models (e.g., MARA, KNA1, VBAK). - Using SQL or Excel for backend data comparison and validation. - Executing sample record checks and verifying business logic post-migration.

QA Fundamentals: - Strong grasp of test planning, test execution, and regression testing. - Ability to create traceability matrices and test summary reports. - Experience working in Agile/Scrum environments. - Exploratory Testing: Identifying edge cases and usability issues.

Secondary Skills:

Technical & Automation Awareness: - Basic SQL: For data validation and backend checks. - Basic understanding of API testing using Postman or Swagger. - Exposure to test automation tools like Selenium or Playwright (even if not hands-on). - Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and how QA fits into release cycles.

SAP ECC Insights: - Ability to interpret ABAP logic or collaborate with SAP developers for test data setup. - Understanding of IDocs, BAPIs, or RFCs used in data extraction.

Optimizely Platform Knowledge: - Awareness of Optimizely personalization, content blocks, and catalog structures. - Understanding of customer journeys and how migrated data impacts user experience.

Soft Skills

  • Strong communication and documentation abilities.
  • Analytical thinking to identify edge cases and potential data issues.
  • Proactive collaboration with developers, business analysts, and stakeholders.

Interested candidates may forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com along with their notice period, current and expected CTC details.

We are seeking an experienced Microsoft 365 Administrator to manage, secure, and optimize the organization’s M365 environment and ensure seamless integration with Azure Cloud. The role involves overseeing endpoint management, identity, security, collaboration tools, and compliance operations while providing advanced troubleshooting and automation through PowerShell.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Device & Endpoint Management: Configure and manage devices via Intune/MDM, enforce compliance, deploy applications, and manage OS patching.

  • Security (Defender): Configure Defender for Endpoint, Identity, and Cloud Apps; handle incidents and secure score improvements.
